description: Collected GPX tracks on our vacation and had to set the timestamps on go pro videos which were, for some reason, more off than just a single offset.

This is good for editing and analysing a gpx route or to create a segment.
Used for interpreting gpx file cycling data.

Really nice app. Really usefull to prepare for walks. Easilly projects any .gpx and .kml to Open street Maps. Also usefull to prepare a trip by adding your points to the map and exporting the .gpx track to your chosen gps device. Perfect!
I was able to take all of the gpx data from my garmin and plot it on the map. I would like to find imagery though. I might have been doing it wrong, but I could only find maps.

I've been looking for a Linux equivalent of Garmin Basecamp, and this is pretty good. If the devs read these reviews, then please consider the possibility of dragging a waypoint with the mouse to reposition it. It seems that it can only be done by manually entering new co-ords which is tedious. Some of my tracks have corrupted positions and it would be nice to reposition the points with the mouse.
summary: Great GUI to view and manipulate GPS data

description: The only fault is with corrupted gpx file, but you could always use your text editor to repaire it (adding some missing ending tags).
Freezes with no error message when adding a picture, to show position in map. Kubuntu 22.04.
Just started using the app. initial impression is good.
Llevaba mucho tiempo buscando un programa en Ubuntu que me permitiese modificar los track de las rutas que realizaba. Gpsprune resuelve muy bien todo lo que necesitaba. Bien por el software libre.

Es necesaria una aplicación de linux para este tipo de formato, es el unico paso que me falta para independizarme completamente de los programas de windows en mi flujo de trabajo. GPS Prune, resuelve para mi todos los aspectos de georeferenciación, pero necesito que esté en RAW.
summary: Me encantaría que sumen el formato RAW

description: J'ai eu beaucoup de mal à comprendre sa logique de fonctionnement et il y a encore beaucoup de fonction que je ne comprends pas. Je l'utilise pour créer des parcours car mon créateur de gpx préféré ne fonctionne pas correctement sous ubuntu (je suis un mediocre utilisateur de Ubuntu et incapable de gérer windows et Ubuntu). Ce que je reproche à GPS Prune c'est la gestion des sens de circulation, l'absence de recherche d'adresse, le calcul des dénivellés plutot hésitants. Mais en jonglant avec routeconverter mal installé c'est tres bien, si seulement ces deux logiciels pouvaient collaborer.
Loading SRTM files does not work.
summary: Loading SRTM files does not work
